meaning_str.bing:
v. 调查；研究；调查（某人）
网络. 调查研究；审查；考察

侦察（某事）；调查（某人）；研究

1.en: He says he is confident about his own integrity, and hopes the judicial system will quickly investigate the matter.
1.cn: 他也强调对自己的操守有信心，希望司法尽快侦办。

2.en: A year ago, in response to a previous hunger strike, Mr Insulza said he would go to Venezuela to investigate.
2.cn: 一年前作为对先前的饥饿罢工的回应，Insulza说他会到委内瑞拉进行调查。

3.en: The analysis portion in your own environment may be very different, depending on what you are trying to investigate.
3.cn: 在您自己的实际情况当中，分析工作可能有很大的不同，这取决于您想调查什么。

0.en: I was able to investigate Jaeger. I found this.
0.cn: 我调查了耶格，发现了这个

1.en: Captain, would you be so kind as to investigate?
1.cn: 队长，你可以去调查下吗？

2.en: We need the UN to investigate the blast site.
2.cn: 我们需要联合国去调查爆炸地点。

3.en: And if either continues, the feds are going to investigate and revoke your eligibility to receive funding.
3.cn: 无论哪个案子继续下去，你们都会被联邦调查局调查，并被撤销集资资格。

4.en: Well, instead of a committee to investigate you, you got one to discuss your declaration.
4.cn: 现在没有调查你的委员会了，而是成立了讨论你声明的委员会。

5.en: My mission has been to investigate the application of paranormal powers in military defense. Or offense.
5.cn: 我的任务是调查超自然力量在军事防御中的应用，或攻击。

6.en: So that you or a servant can keep watch. Then we'll have time to investigate the loss of the knife.
6.cn: 这样您或者哪个仆人能盯着点，这样我们也有时间来调查刀丢失的事了。

7.en: Look, I'm sorry if you're frustrated, but our job is to investigate how a plane ended up in the Hudson River.
7.cn: 我并无意想惹恼你，可我们的工作就是去调查飞机掉进哈德逊河的原因。

8.en: Yes, you investigate, analyze, assess, target. And then you have to look him in the eye. And you make the call.
8.cn: 没错，要调查分析，评估之后，锁定目标，然后你要看着对方的眼睛，做出决定。

9.en: It means that we can't have someone this close to the case helping investigate it. It's my fault for getting you involved in the first place.
9.cn: 意味着我们不允许一个与案件密切相关的人参与调查。是我的错让你卷入整个案件。

10.en: What happened? There was a great storm. We ventured out into the Tulgey woods to investigate.
10.cn: 发生了什么事？在一次大风暴中，我们几个跑到淘气森林去探查情况。

11.en: And Captain, you cannot deviate from the mission while inside the Source Code. Even to investigate your… Even to investigate what happened to you. There is only one continuum on this end and it can't be unsettled.
11.cn: 上尉，你在源代码中时不能分心想任务以外的事情，甚至不能去深究自己发生了什么事，这个终端的程序一致连续，由不得你乱搅和。

12.en: And when the eyes spot something they like, our instinct is to move closer so the other senses can investigate.
12.cn: 而当眼睛看见喜欢的事物时，我们的本能便是靠上前，好让其他的感官也能够侦察。
